title: backpacker.gr celebrates its first year!
content:
backpacker.gr was born this very day (16 January) exactly one year ago (2006). So, it celebrates ... with a retrospective, 4 new typefaces, an interview with Akiem Helmling (Underware) and an unbeatable urge to keep on learning, designing, communicating ...

[http://www.backpacker.gr](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014225918/http:/www.backpacker.gr/)
author: gtrianta
